title: Superhalide structure and iodide-proof interphase via electrolyte regulation enable ultrastable zinc-iodine batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02192D, Paper
Wenjing Deng, Renfei Feng, Xiaolei Wang
A superhalide electrolyte structure and iodide-proof solid electrolyte interphase are introduced to simultaneously obtain efficient conversion activity and anode stability for reversible zincâ€“iodine batteries.
